en.INTERNET_DISCONNECTED:
We’re sorry, we can’t seem to connect to the Jackbox Games servers.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly.
en.ROOM_DESTROYED:
We’re sorry, a network error occurred and your room was destroyed.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly.
en.ROOM_EXIT_CAUSE_LOBBY_TIMEOUT:
We're sorry, a network error occurred and your room was destroyed.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly. (Cause: 1)
en.ROOM_EXIT_CAUSE_JOIN_TIMEOUT:
We're sorry, a network error occurred and your room was destroyed.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly. (Cause: 2)
en.ROOM_EXIT_CAUSE_GAME_TIMEOUT:
We're sorry, a network error occurred and your room was destroyed.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly. (Cause: 3)
en.ROOM_EXIT_CAUSE_DISCONNECT:
We're sorry, a network error occurred and your room was destroyed.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly. (Cause: 4)
en.ROOM_EXIT_CAUSE_BY_REQUEST:
We're sorry, a network error occurred and your room was destroyed.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly. (Cause: 5)
en.ROOM_EXIT_CAUSE_SHUTTING_DOWN:
We're sorry, a network error occurred and your room was destroyed.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly. (Cause: 6)
en.SOCKET_DISCONNECTED: We’re sorry, we’ve lost your connection to the Jackbox Games servers.
en.TIMEOUT:
We’re sorry, we can’t seem to connect to the Jackbox Games servers.
Please check that your internet connection is working properly.
en.USER_DISCONNECT: We’re sorry, the server has disconnected you. Please try again.
en.LOST_LICENSE: We’re sorry, we lost the license for this content!
en.STEAM_ERROR: We’re sorry, we couldn’t validate your Steam license.
en.TWITCH_PRIME_ERROR: We’re sorry, we couldn’t validate your Twitch license.
en.LOST_DLC: We’re sorry, the license for your DLC could not be found. Returning you to the menu...
en.INFO_TAGLINE_GAME_1: Erwecke deine schlimmen Zeichnungen zum Leben!
en.INFO_TAGLINE_GAME_3: Nutze die Wörter der anderen, um den Job zu bekommen!
en.INFO_TAGLINE_GAME_4: Erratet im Team die Antworten eurer Freunde und entkommt!
en.INFO_TAGLINE_GAME_5: Ein soziales Deduktionsspiel, bei dem es jeder getan hat!
en.HOW_TO_PANEL_1:
Sucht euch ein Spiel aus
und sucht dann den vierstelligen Raum-Code.
en.HOW_TO_PANEL_2:
Geht mit eurem Handy oder Tablet auf jackbox.tv
mithilfe eines Internet-Browsers.
en.HOW_TO_PANEL_3:
Gebt den Raum-Code ein,
einen Namen und drückt spielen. Das war's!
en.HOW_TO_PANEL_4: Wenn alle Spieler beigetreten sind, kann der erste Spieler das Spiel starten.
en.HOW_TO_PANEL_5:
Bis zu 8 Spieler können mitmachen. Manchmal mehr.
Alle Spiele sind für Jugendliche geeignet.
en.HOW_TO_PANEL_6:
Viele Spiele haben einen Familienmodus,
der in den Einstellungen der Spiele gefunden werden kann.
en.HOW_TO_PANEL_7:
Weitere Infos zu den Einstellungen, dem Online-Spiel,
und mehr findet ihr unter jackboxgames.com/howtoplay
